targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("time_iowait"), 2s) FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("time_iowait"), 2s) FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) ,"host" fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("time_iowait"), 2s) FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) ,"host" fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("time_iowait"), 2s) FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) ,"host" fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("time_iowait"), 2s) FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) ,"host" fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("IpExtOutOctets"), 1s) FROM "nstat" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(null)

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY = "host"
